title: Sadly, Riot doesn't care about you.
body:
I've been going back and forth with Riot support for quite some time now, and after a ton of tickets it has become painfully apparent that to Riot Games, we are just numbers.  Does any other game company punish the player when their game crashes?  Do any other games punish the player for playing a game where a teammate never even connects, or even worse griefs them into a loss?  Do any other games allow armies of raging spoiled trolls rule the game and refuse to do anything about it?

All while they are making millions.
